name: ARPB_TX_STMCLAIMHX
description: This table contains information about the statement and claim history for professional billing transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transaction record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: BC_HX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether the current line is a bill or claim entry.  A category value of 1 means claim and 2 means bill.

columns.name: BC_HX_DATE
columns.description: The date the statement or claim was processed. This can be NULL when an insurance payment posts and it canï¿½t find a matching claim with that payer in the history.

columns.name: BC_HX_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage that is associated with the bill or claim run

columns.name: BC_HX_ASSIGNED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the coverage is assigned to insurance for this transaction. Y indicates the coverage is assigned.

columns.name: BC_HX_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount of the transaction on the bill or claim.

columns.name: BC_HX_INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number for the bill or claim.

columns.name: BC_HX_PAYMENT_AMT
columns.description: Payment amount for payment associated with this invoice.  This field applies to claims only.

columns.name: BC_HX_PAYMENT_DATE
columns.description: Payment date for payment associated with this invoice.  This field applies to claims only.

columns.name: BC_HX_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payor for this claim. This field applies to claims only.

columns.name: BC_HX_RESUBMIT_DATE
columns.description: Resubmit date for this claim.  This field applies to claims only.

columns.name: BC_HX_CLM_DB_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim information record for this claim. This field applies to claims only.

columns.name: BC_HX_HELD_AMOUNT
columns.description: Amount held (not shown) on a bill.  This item applies to bills only.

columns.name: BC_HX_BO_PROC_ID
columns.description: The internal record ID for the procedure billed out on the claim. This item only applies to claims.

columns.name: BC_HX_AUX_PROC
columns.description: Claim Auxiliary Procedure.  This item is only used by claims.  This is populated when claim bundling grouping rules are used and there are procedures that are left over from the claim. This item is a semicolon delimited list of extra procedures.  For example, if the bundling rule is set up to bundle and 99212 and a 99213 and there are two 99212s and one 99213, then the 99212 procedure identifier would appear in this column.

columns.name: BC_HX_ACCEPT_DATE
columns.description: Accept date for bill or claim

columns.name: BC_HX_FIRST_CLM_FLG
columns.description: This item is set to 0 for accepted claims where all previous lines in the statement-claim history are claims. This item is set to 1 for accepted claims where there is at least one previous line in the statement-claim history that was a statement.  This item is only populated for claims.

columns.name: BC_HX_AR_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: AR classification at the time of claim/statement run acceptance.

columns.name: BC_HX_ACCEPT_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time the statement or claim was accepted.
